thread.title: 12 Etiquette Screw-Ups In 1896 - WGBH
thread.title_full: 12 Etiquette Screw-Ups In 1896 - WGBH - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: WGBH
title: 12 Etiquette Screw-Ups In 1896 - WGBH
text:
Later this month in Los Angeles, at the annual convention of the Human Factors and Ergonomics Society - a group that focuses on making systems, devices and machines more human-friendly - researchers plan to report on a study showing that people want robots to be more mannerly and polite. In America, though, manners and mores are ever-morphing.
 WGBH.
